content:
ShopRite does have a loyalty program called **ShopRite Price Plus**. It's a free program that rewards customers with discounts, digital coupons, and other perks. As a member, you can earn points for every dollar you spend at ShopRite, and redeem those points for discounts on future purchases.

With ShopRite Price Plus, you can:

* Earn points on every dollar you spend
* Redeem points for discounts on groceries and other items
* Get exclusive digital coupons and sales
* Receive personalized offers and discounts based on your shopping habits
* Use the ShopRite mobile app to track your points, clip digital coupons, and more

To join ShopRite Price Plus, you can sign up on their website or through the ShopRite mobile app. It's free and easy to join, and you can start earning points and redeeming rewards right away.

It's great that you're already using Fetch Rewards, and now you can also take advantage of ShopRite's loyalty program to maximize your savings!
